description:
Onyankopon watched over people long ago, but one day an old woman accidentally hit Onyankopon in the head with a mallet while mashing yams. Since then, Onyankopon has been nervous about greeting people directly, and so sends subordinates to speak to them and solve their problems. He will use Afrobeat and dance to help Japanese high school girls with problems such as dieting, love, and cramming for exams.
Source: ANN

REGULAR.description:
The school cultural festival is coming up, and the girls can’t figure out what to wear or dance. Onyankopon to the rescue!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cute Is Best, Meow
Kawaiitte Saikou Da Nya
カワイイって最高だニャ

REGULAR.description:
The four friends are having a heated discussion on how to make your crush notice you.
Meanwhile, the rabbit in the Onyankopon temple is really energetic for some reason...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Love Good Luck Charms, Meow
Omajinai Daisuki Da Nya
おまじない大好きだニャ

REGULAR.description:
The four friends are commiserating over all sorts of quirky things that happen to them.
Then they finally arrive at the dreaded topic of the upcoming test that they all wish would just disappear...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Benkyou Nanka Shitakunai Da Nya
I Don`t Want to Study, Meow
勉強なんかしたくないだニャ

REGULAR.description:
It`s Onyankopon`s day off, and to his dismay, nobody prepared any food for him.
Then, to make matter worse, Onyankopon finds out that someone`s been rating his dances!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It`s Onyankopon`s Day Off, Meow
Onyankopon no Kyuujitsu Da Nya
おにゃんこポンの休日だニャ

REGULAR.description:
Having a small face is important on every realm.
Onyankopon-sama, please help!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It`ll Make Your Face Smaller, Meow
Kogao ni Utsurundesu Da Nya
小顔に写るんですだニャ

REGULAR.description:
High school girls have a green thumb but Onyankopon-sama`s too busy for that because his game is buggy.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Atashi no Daisougen Da Nya
This Is My Prairie, Meow
あたしの大草原だニャ

REGULAR.description:
What to do you do when you have too much free time?
Let`s find out what the girls do.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hima na Jikantte Dou Sugosu? Da Nya
How to Spend Free Time? Meow
ヒマな時間ってどうすごす? だニャ

REGULAR.description:
Onyankopon-sama`s checking out the classroom that the girls always hang out in.
But then an insolent human dares to treat the great Onyankopon-sama like this?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It`s Onyankopon`s Day Off Again, Meow
Matamata Onyankopon no Kyuujitsu Da Nya
またまた おにゃんこポンの休日だニャ

REGULAR.description:
Onyankopon-sama is agonizing whether to pick the rabbit or the turtle.
Meanwhile, Seri doesn`t want to come with to the bathroom. Is this the beginning of the end?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Issho ni Ikanaitte Dou Iu Koto? Da Nya
What Does It Mean If They`re Not Going Together? Meow
一緒に行かないってどういうこと? だニャ

REGULAR.description:
For some reason the girls are all annoyed and angry at all sorts of things.
But then, even Onyankopon-sama is really irritable.
Can the dance help them shake off their grievances?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Senpai Mukatsukuu Da Nya
Senpai Pisses Me Off, Meow
先輩むかつく~だニャ

REGULAR.description:
Even Onyankopon-sama gets nervous sometimes.
But apparently writing something onto your hand and swallowing that is supposed to help.
What`s exactly is one supposed to write?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kinchou Shichatte Dou Shiyou Da Nya
What to Do About Getting Nervous, Meow
緊張しちゃってどうしようだニャ

REGULAR.description:
It`s been a long time coming, but it`s finally time for the girls` dance performance!
Let`s see if all the singing and dancing with Onyankopon paid off!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Everything Is Onyankopon If You Just Dance, Meow
Odoreba Subete ga, Onyankopon Da Nya
踊ればすべてが, おにゃんこポンだニャ
Ending
Onyankopon
Onyankopon
おにゃんこポン
